abstract.t: This document investigates the requirements of a minimal architecture for the Static Context Header Compression (and fragmentation) protocol (SCHC). The intent is to identify the essential components their relationships and interfaces. To do so, the document considers scenarios of increasing complexity involving the use of SCHC, from a simple point-to-point communication to a more complex deployment involving multiple SCHC Instances communicating with each other. In this process, the authors hope to identify the essential components of a SCHC architecture and their relationships.
